body_html:
There are modulation artifacts produced by windowing:
http://librosa.github.io/librosa/0.6.0rc0/generated/librosa.filters.window_sumsquare.html

The code they use to remove these artifacts lives here:
https://github.com/librosa/librosa/blob/6d791248832b45c0529045f3ed007860756b2a7a/librosa/core/spectrum.py#L302

If you add the blackman window, I think we have the standard set of windows supported by STFT implementations I have seen.

body:
There are modulation artifacts produced by windowing:
http://librosa.github.io/librosa/0.6.0rc0/generated/librosa.filters.window_sumsquare.html

The code they use to remove these artifacts lives here:
https://github.com/librosa/librosa/blob/6d791248832b45c0529045f3ed007860756b2a7a/librosa/core/spectrum.py#L302

If you add the blackman window, I think we have the standard set of windows supported by STFT implementations I have seen.
